eyama waraddaki.sesu awastha sandaha kanthawage kamaththa thibunada nadda yanna adhikaranayedi wisandaාgatha yuthu prshnayak.ehidi kanthawage wayasa awurudu 12 -14, 14 - 16, saha 16 -18 , eeta wadi awasthawala meya eeee awasthawa anuwa wenas wenawa.me kamath thibunada nadda yanna thahawuru kirimata siddhiya sidu wu welawa, sthanaya ee awasthawa, siduwu haniya, ( thuwala, sirim, sapim, ) ee mohothe ee thanaththiya eeta erehi wimata dakwu pruthiwirodhaya saha withthikaruge swabhawayath, ee mehothe anda siti andum aadiyath, mema siddhiya polisiyata / adhikaranayata wartha wu kalayath athara paratharaya me kri yawa oppu kirimata wadagath sadhaka.polisiyata labadun prathakashayath, mahesthraeth adhikaranayedi karanu labu diwurum pita prakashayath padanam karagena mahadhikaranaye naduwa wimasanawa.mehidi adala sthrira dushana naduwa wibhagaya aarambha kirimata pera adhikarana shalawata pamina sitina sesu siyaluma mahajanaya athulu parshawa adhikarana shalawen iwath kala pasu naduwa wimasima arambae.
